text: Yakshcho tam bulo shvydke pryviley materialu, ta korotka mandrivka, vony by proslidkuvaly za vamy. Ale prahnuchyy til聞ky nadto bahato dlya nykh. Vony prysyahnut聞sya BOHOM: "Yakshcho b my mohly, my by mobilizuvaly z vamy." Vony takym chynom zavdayut聞 bil聞 sebe, ta BOH znaye shcho vony brekhuny
